name: Best Bakeshop Challenge
description:
A downloadable game for Windows, Linux

Best Bakeshop Challenge is a highly interactive visual novel about love, lies, and baking. 

Who will win the ultimate title of Best Bakeshop? 

 Its down to the last 8 neighbourhood bakeshops for the semi-finals of the Best Bakeshop Challenge.  Only the most determined challengers remain.  Each bakery has a story.  Each contestant has a reason to win. 

You score the bakeries as they compete for the title of Best Bakery. 

Judging won't be easy. The contestants are an assorted crew of bakers determined to win, and  the battle isn't only in the kitchen.
